Name: Tootie Fruity Lifesaver
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of tootie Fruity lollypop or 3 Luxardo Maraschino Cherries on a stick rested across the glass rim..
Review: Tropical fruit laced with delicate notes of herbal spearmint freshness.
History: Appropriately, this fruity cocktail takes its name from tutti frutti, the Italian for 'all fruits'. Outside Italy, tutti-fruity mainly refers to mixed fruit flavoured ice cream but is also fruit flavoured confectionery. Life Savers are an American brand of ring-shaped hard and soft confectionery created in 1912 by Clarence Crane, a candy maker in Ohio.
Nutrition: One serving of Tootie Fruity Lifesaver contains 251 calories
